metadata.name: Indicator Measure
metadata.description: To specify how an indicator is being measured. This includes qualitative and quantitative values.

data.name: Unit
data.description: The indicator is measured in units.

data.name: Percentage
data.description: The indicator is measured in percentages

data.name: Nominal
data.description: The indicator is measured as a quantitative nominal scale.

data.name: Ordinal
data.description: The indicator is measured as a quantitative ordinal scale.
